divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend work midnights and had just got up to go to work, I walked outside to check the weather and saw a bright red light in the sky, as it got closer it had an orange middle it it. I yelled for my girlfriend to come see it, she came out and saw it as well. the object had no sound was flying north to south, flew right over our apartment into the clouds, then disappeared. then as i was looking in the direction of it's disappearing, i turned my head to see a second one coming in the same flight pattern. i could see and air plane behind it flying from west to east with strobe lights, so i knew it was not a plane. I have never seen anything like it in my life. it was amazing to see something like that.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Newton Falls
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: went to check the weather out side and saw a red light with orange in the middle fly over head with no sound or strobes--then saw a second one fly over after. was not a plane or helicopter
